_comment: Branding configuration for Agentic RAG - All fields are optional
name: Agentic RAG

ascii_art._comment: ASCII art logos - use array format for better control

colors._comment: Color theme for gradient effects and tips

startup_tips: 1. Use doc_index to index documents into vector database
2. Use vector_search for semantic similarity search
3. Use rerank to improve search result relevance
4. Use collection_info to check database status
5. /help for command list and tool usage
7. ESC to clear input or exit
keyboard_hints: ESC: Clear/Exit  |  Ctrl+C: Copy then Enter to paste  |  ''': Multi-line input
home_dir_warning: Recommended to run from project directory
